meanings.definition: The direction opposite to that of the north.
meanings.sent1: I always know where to find the south when I see the sun setting.
meanings.sent2: She traveled to the south for a warmer climate.
meanings.sent3: The compass got confused and pointed south when we were actually heading north.
meanings.sent4: In this town, the south is where all the best restaurants are located.
meanings.sent5: The south is like a warm hug from the sun, welcoming and comforting.

meanings.definition: The southern part of a specified area, country, or region.
meanings.sent1: The south of the country is known for its beautiful beaches.
meanings.sent2: Living in the south means enjoying more sunshine throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: I always get lost when I try to navigate my way through the south of the city.
meanings.sent4: Her heart belongs to the south, where she grew up and feels most at home.
meanings.sent5: The south of the forest is where the rarest flowers bloom, painting the landscape in vibrant colors.
